One: The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld.
Two: I always try to help those in need: no matter what the personal cost.
Three: We must help bring about the changes the gods are constantly working in the world.
Four: I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith's religious hierarchy.
Five: I trust that my deity will guide my actions. I have faith that if I work hard: things will go well.
Six: I seek to prove myself worthy of my god's favor by matching my actions against his or her teachings.

One: I am a free spirit - no one tells me what to do.
Two: I never target people who can't afford to lose a few coins.
Three: I distribute the money I acquire to the people who really need it.
Four: I never run the same con twice.
Five: Material goods come and go. Bonds of friendship last forever.
Six: I'm determined to make something of myself.

One: I don't steal from others in the trade.
Two: Chains are meant to be broken: as are those who would forge them.
Three: I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need.
Four: I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy.
Five: I'm loyal to my friends: not to any ideals: and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care.
Six: There's a spark of good in everyone.

One: When I perform: I make the world better than it was.
Two: The stories: legends: and songs of the past must never be forgotten: for they teach us who we are.
Three: The world is in need of new ideas and bold actions.
Four: I'm only in it for the money and fame.
Five: I like seeing the smiles on people's faces when I perform. That's all that matters.
Six: Art should reflect the soul; it should come from within and reveal who we really are.

One: People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect.
Two: No one should get preferential treatment before the law: and no one is above the law.
Three: Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people.
Four: If I become strong: I can take what I want - what I deserve.
Five: There's no good in pretending to be something I'm not.
Six: Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling.

One: It is the duty of all civilized people to strengthn the bodns of community and the security of civilization.
Two: My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world.
Three: Everyone should be free to pursue his or her own livelihood.
Four: I'm only in it for the money.
Five: I'm committed to the people I care about: not to ideals.
Six: I work hard to be the best there is at my craft.
